title: Question about Low Priority Queue
body:
Hello,

I am just wondering, my friend has internet issues and has dealt with the low priority queue on and off. Now we generally have a full team of friends so we don't really care but he dropped out for one game, it had been a long time since the last one and he has been placed back into it.

However this was for the 20 minute queue despite him already going through that one for five games and not "leaving" games for a lengthy period of time.

Should this not be five minutes or does the queue time not reset despite time passing.

Thank you for your answers.

replies.body: Five minutes is the lowest form of low priority queue. If your friend is getting upwards of a twenty minute wait, then that means he's been leaving games regularly.
